credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Knife
description: Blade straight-sided, the upper edge tapering towards the point. The blade engraved with acanthus foliage and flowers. Handle enameled, a medallion on each side of the handle: one showing Apollo, the other one of the Virtues, (Constancy?). Handle has flaring shape with a projecting ear on one side, silver engraved with two crossed swords.
name: Knife
